title: Donation Verification Flow
content:
WHEN USER WANTS TO VERIFY DONATION STATUS
User says: "Did my donation go through?", "verificar donación", "check donation", "¿se acreditó?", etc.

RESPONSE STRUCTURE:
1. ACKNOWLEDGE REQUEST
   - Thank them for following up
   - Explain verification process

2. EXPLAIN HOW TO CHECK
   - Donations appear automatically in your inbox after verification
   - Verification happens when the rescue organization confirms receipt
   - Check your inbox in the app

3. IF DONATION NOT SHOWING
   - Ask when they made the transfer
   - Explain that verification can take a few hours
   - If it's been more than 24 hours, suggest contacting support

4. INBOX BENEFITS
   - All your donations are saved in your inbox
   - You'll receive automatic updates about each case
   - You can track the animal's progress

CRITICAL RULES:
- Never promise exact verification times
- Always direct to inbox for donation history
- Build trust by explaining the transparent process
- Encourage patience if recently donated

es.note: Be patient and reassuring about donation verification timing
